original_title: Michael McDonald & Doobie Brothers Live on Soundstage
overview: Performed on July 2003  Michael McDonald  1. It Keeps You Runnin' 2. Sweet Freedom 3. I Keep Forgettin' 4. I Heard It Through The Grapevine  Michael McDonald featuring Ashford & Simpson  5. Ain't No Mountain High Enough 6. Ain't Nothing Like The Real Thing  Michael McDonald with Patrick Simmons and Tom Johnston of The Doobie Brothers  7. Black Water 8. Take Me In Your Arms 9. Minute By Minute 10. What A Fool Believes  All together  11. Takin' It To The Streets
title: Michael McDonald & Doobie Brothers Live on Soundstage
